instructions: Heat oil in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned. Remove chicken. Add soup and water. Heat to a boil. Stir in rice and broccoli. Top with chicken. Cover and cook over low heat 5 minutes or until done.
title: Chicken and Rice Dinner
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell's® Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup (Regular, 98% Fat Free or 25% Less Sodium)
2 cups fresh OR frozen broccoli flowerets
